languages.text: Этим благородным клинком был обезглавлен Лорд Каркалла, лидер восстания Требула. Несмотря на подлый мятеж и отступничество, даже враги признавали доблесть и благородство Каркаллы, коему было даровано право умереть через почетное усечение головы.

Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck clean with this noble blade. Despite his apostasy, even his enemies recognised the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death by beheading.
languages.original_text: Этим благородным клинком был обезглавлен Лорд Каркалла, лидер восстания Требула. Несмотря на подлый мятеж и отступничество, даже враги признавали доблесть и благородство Каркаллы, коему было даровано право умереть через почетное усечение головы.

traits.locale_text: Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck off with this noble blade. Despite the apostasy, even his enemies recognized the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death through beheading.

Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck off with this noble blade. Despite the apostasy, even his enemies recognized the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death through beheading.

Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck clean with this noble blade. Despite his apostasy, even his enemies recognised the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death by beheading.

Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck clean with this noble blade. Despite his apostasy, even his enemies recognised the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death by beheading.

languages.text: 特雷布尔叛军领袖卡尔卡拉勋爵被俘获之后，被这把剑斩首。尽管他犯下了叛教的罪行，但即便是他的敌人也承认他的英勇与高尚之举。到最后，他被慷慨地授予了高贵的斩首之刑。
languages.original_text: Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck clean with this noble blade. Despite his apostasy, even his enemies recognised the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death by beheading.

traits.locale_text: 特雷布尔叛军领袖卡尔卡拉勋爵被俘获之后，被这把剑斩首。尽管他犯下了叛教的罪行，但即便是他的敌人也承认他的英勇与高尚之举。到最后，他被慷慨地授予了高贵的斩首之刑。

languages.text: トレブルの反乱のリーダーであったロード・カルカラは、この高貴な刃で頭を切り落とされた。背教者であったにもかかわらず、敵でさえもカルカラの武勇と気高さを認め、彼は寛大にも打ち首という高貴な死を賜った。
languages.original_text: Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck clean with this noble blade. Despite his apostasy, even his enemies recognised the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death by beheading.

traits.locale_text: トレブルの反乱のリーダーであったロード・カルカラは、この高貴な刃で頭を切り落とされた。背教者であったにもかかわらず、敵でさえもカルカラの武勇と気高さを認め、彼は寛大にも打ち首という高貴な死を賜った。

languages.text: Lord Karkalla, el líder de la rebelión Trebul, fue decapitado limpiamente con esta noble espada. A pesar de su apostasía, hasta sus enemigos reconocían el valor de Karkalla, a quien se concedió una muerte noble por decapitación.
languages.original_text: Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck clean with this noble blade. Despite his apostasy, even his enemies recognised the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death by beheading.

traits.locale_text: Lord Karkalla, el líder de la rebelión Trebul, fue decapitado limpiamente con esta noble espada. A pesar de su apostasía, hasta sus enemigos reconocían el valor de Karkalla, a quien se concedió una muerte noble por decapitación.

languages.text: Cette auguste lame a tranché la tête du seigneur Karkalla, chef de la rébellion Trebul. Malgré son apostasie, ses ennemis le condamnèrent à mort par décapitation en respect de son courage et de sa noblesse.
languages.original_text: Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck clean with this noble blade. Despite his apostasy, even his enemies recognised the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death by beheading.

traits.locale_text: Cette auguste lame a tranché la tête du seigneur Karkalla, chef de la rébellion Trebul. Malgré son apostasie, ses ennemis le condamnèrent à mort par décapitation en respect de son courage et de sa noblesse.

languages.text: Lord Karkalla, der Anführer des Trebul-Aufstands, wurde mit dieser edlen Klinge enthauptet. Trotz seiner Apostasie erkannten sogar seine Feinde Karkallas Mut und Ehrenhaftigkeit an, weswegen ihm der edle Tod durch Enthauptung zugebilligt wurde.
languages.original_text: Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck clean with this noble blade. Despite his apostasy, even his enemies recognised the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death by beheading.

traits.locale_text: Lord Karkalla, der Anführer des Trebul-Aufstands, wurde mit dieser edlen Klinge enthauptet. Trotz seiner Apostasie erkannten sogar seine Feinde Karkallas Mut und Ehrenhaftigkeit an, weswegen ihm der edle Tod durch Enthauptung zugebilligt wurde.

languages.text: Trebul isyanının lideri Lord Karkalla'nın kellesi, bu asil kılıçla tek hamlede uçurulmuştur. Karkalla'nın dininden dönmesine rağmen yiğitliğini ve asaletini düşmanları bile kabul etmiş, bu sebeple de kendisine başı kesilmek suretiyle asil bir ölüm bahşedilmiştir.
languages.original_text: Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck clean with this noble blade. Despite his apostasy, even his enemies recognised the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death by beheading.
